Package renderer.core.camera

Class Transformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • renderer.core.camera.Transformation
  • public class Transformation
extends java.lang.Object
    The Transformation class represents a transformation in 3D space. author: cdehais

    • Method Detail

      • setLookAt

        public void setLookAt​(Vector eye,
                      Vector lookAtPoint,
                      Vector up)
        Sets the lookAt transformation.
        Parameters:
        eye - a 3D vector representing the eye position
        lookAtPoint - a 3D vector representing the point to look at
        up - a 3D vector representing the up direction

      • setProjection

        public void setProjection()
        Sets the projection matrix.

      • setCalibration

        public void setCalibration​(double focal,
                           double width,
                           double height)
        Sets the calibration matrix.
        Parameters:
        focal - the focal length
        width - the width of the image
        height - the height of the image

      • projectPoint

        public Vector projectPoint​(Vector p)
                    throws SizeMismatchException
        Projects the given 3 dimensional point onto the screen. The resulting Vector as its (x,y) coordinates in pixel, and its z coordinate is the depth of the point in the camera coordinate system.
        Parameters:
        p - a 3d vector representing a point
        Returns:
        the projected point as a 3d vector, with (x,y) the pixel coordinates and z the depth
        Throws:
        SizeMismatchException - if the size of the input vector is not 3

      • transformVector

        public Vector transformVector​(Vector v)
        Transform a vector from world to camera coordinates.
        Parameters:
        v - the vector to transform
        Returns:
        the transformed vector
        Throws:
        SizeMismatchException - if the size of the input vector is not 3
